name: 3D Groove Model
summary: A 3GM file is a 3D model used in a video game developed using the 3D Groove Engine. These games, primarily developed by The Groove Alliance, were typically free online games created to promote toys, movies, or cartoons. The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie 3D Game is an example of a game that used 3GM files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Referenced and used by various 3D Groove Engine games
